Item ID1339

The steel warhammer is a warhammer stronger than the iron warhammer. Unlike other steel weapons, it requires 5 Strength to wield. Players can make a steel warhammer with the Smithing skill at level 39 using three steel bars, giving 112.5 Smithing experience.

Player can purchase this warhammer from Vigr's Warhammers in Keldagrim and Skulgrimen's Battle Gear in Rellekka (completion of The Fremennik Trials is required). The base price of a steel warhammer at NPC stores is 832 coins.

A steel warhammer is one of the weapons requested during the In Search of the Myreque quest.

The steel warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular hammer when banging the big door at the entrance of Bandos' Stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)
  • Steel warhammers now require level 5 Strength to wield instead of level 5 Attack.
  • The steel warhammer's strength bonus was increased from 16 to 18.
29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

[[File:Steel warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''steel warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] stronger than the [[iron warhammer]]. Unlike other [[steel weapons]], it requires 5 [[Strength]] to wield. Players can make a steel warhammer with the Smithing [[skill]] at level 39 using three [[steel bar]]s, giving 112.5 Smithing [[experience]].

Player can purchase this warhammer from [[Vigr's Warhammers]] in [[Keldagrim]] and [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]] in [[Rellekka]] (completion of [[The Fremennik Trials]] is required). The base price of a steel warhammer at NPC stores is 832 [[coins]].

A steel warhammer is one of the weapons requested during the [[In Search of the Myreque]] [[quest]].

The steel warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular [[hammer]] when banging the big door at the entrance of [[Bandos' Stronghold]] in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
